name: test_ssh_debug
description:
arrange: given an integrated GitHub-Runner charm and tmate-ssh-server charm.
    act: when canonical/action-tmate is triggered.
    assert: the ssh connection info from action-log and tmate-ssh-server matches.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given an integrated GitHub-Runner charm and tmate-ssh-server charm.
act: when canonical/action-tmate is triggered.
assert: the ssh connection info from action-log and tmate-ssh-server matches.
